info.title: Horizon Sync - Billing & Accounting Service
info.description: Microservice for managing customers, suppliers, invoicing, and accounting.

get.description: List all customers for the organization.

schema.title: Response List Customers Api V1 Customers  Get

get.description: Get a specific customer by ID.

schema.title: Response List Suppliers Api V1 Suppliers  Get

post.description: Submits a draft invoice, making it SENT and creating accounting entries.
Record a payment and optionally allocate to invoices.

schema.title: Response List Accounts Api V1 Accounting Accounts Get

post.description: Create a new account in COA.
Creates a manual journal entry. Must be balanced (Sum Dr = Sum Cr).
